name: Heaven's Vault
description: Explore the lost ruins of the Nebula, read ancient inscriptions, and uncover a forgotten past in this narrative archaeological science-fiction adventure game from the creators of 80 Days.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2+ Gb of vram DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel HD GPUs
